messages.content: I'm planning a trip to Seattle next month for a tech conference.
That sounds exciting! Seattle is a great city. When exactly is the conference?
It's from April 15-17. The conference is at the Washington State Convention Center. I'll need to book a hotel nearby.
Good idea to book early. Do you have any preferences for the hotel?
I prefer staying at a Marriott or Hilton if possible. Walking distance to the convention center would be ideal. My budget is around $200 per night.
Those are good choices. Have you booked your flight yet?
Not yet. I'm flying from San Francisco. I'll probably take an early morning flight on April 14th and return on April 18th.
That gives you a day to settle in before the conference starts. Will you be going alone or with colleagues?
My colleague Jennifer from TechCorp will be joining me. We're both interested in the AI and machine learning sessions at the conference.
Great to have a colleague along! Are you planning any activities outside the conference?
Yes, I'd love to visit the Space Needle and Pike Place Market if we have time. Maybe grab dinner at some good seafood restaurants too.
